ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I am level 10. I spent 1 point in Old Erudin and 1 in Gnoll (the only two new languages I have available at the moment). I only tried at my own guild hall
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Jan Sterken" <jsterken@...>
> Can anyone help me with a language question?
> I spent one training point on the languages Dwarven, Gnoll, and Erudian (sp)
> when at the Academy of Sciences in Freeport but these languages do not show
> up in my skills when training at other trainers, and they also are not
> available as languages in my chat window. Anyone have any idea why? Also
> assuming I figure out how this can be fixed how can I improve my skill in
> these easiest.

I am level 10. I spent 1 point in Old Erudin and 1 in Gnoll (the only two
new languages I have available at the moment). I only tried at my own
guild hall in Erudin, since I won't talk magic with those thieving humans.
Anyway, I DO have those languages available in my languages window, so I
don't think it's a matter of skill.

Ramagh,
Fenin Ro.
